name: Persons exempt from licensure
text: §464-3  Persons exempt from licensure.  Persons practicing professional engineering, architecture, land surveying, or landscape architecture solely as officers or employees of the United States shall be exempted from the provisions of this chapter. [L 1923, c 227, §8; RL 1925, §3690; am L 1931, c 165, §5; RL 1935, §7031; RL 1945, §7603; RL 1955, §166-3; am L 1961, c 142, §12(a); HRS §464-3; am L 1970, c 85, §1; am L 1983, c 155, §1; am L 1989, c 210, §5; am L 1997, c 8, §1]
